content: {"name": "Haven of Hope", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We allow clients to sign up for food from 1:30 p.m. to 3pm. in order to receive food. New client registration from 1 p.m. to 2 p.m. Forgotten Harvest typically delivers food between 1pm-1:30 pm. We prepare bags/boxes of food according to what and how much is delivered to the clients who have signed up by 3pm. Depending on the amount of food delivered, it typically takes about an hour to prepare bags/boxes of food. Clients who have signed up by 3pm must pickup bags/boxes by 5 pm.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.havenofhopecares.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7549 Joy Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Midwest", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48204", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3590526, "longitude": -83.14476289999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 610-7075", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
